#

```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(
  dplyr,
  leaflet)
```

## basic example 

```{r}

m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=lat, lat=lon, popup="The birthplace of R")
m
```
